attributes.action: We want to change the legislation gaps that fail vulnerable children
attributes.additional_details:
Children are dieing in the hands of their own parents!! because the system is failing them, failing to recognise when they need help & support failing because they haven't  done their job properly!! (Re training)
Because  they don't have the funding or power to remove children from disgusting situations, its time this stopped. We will not stand by and watch anymore children die something need to be done this needs to change !!
attributes.background:
We want as a community a nation a country to see social services doing  there jobs properly!!
Offer them a new training program to be able  to give them the power to remove children from abuse in their own homes, we want to ensure  that vulnerable children  are safe & cared for in a proper manner!!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about existing protections for vulnerable children, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Local councils can already seek a court order to take a child into care. You can find out more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/if-your-child-is-taken-into-care

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
